response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I am confident that its potential benefits and qualities will resonate with your needs and expectations. For this exceptional item, I am offering it at a special price of $750,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth, making it an attractive proposition for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
